name: acrovault
description: AcroVault is a tool for looking up Acronyms

scripts.build:chrome: cp -r src/* platform/chrome/src && cp -r icons platform/chrome/ && cp index.html platform/chrome/
scripts.build:firefox: cp -r src/* platform/firefox/src && cp -r icons platform/firefox/ && cp index.html platform/firefox/
scripts.build: npm run build:chrome && npm run build:firefox
